mapper.sql: a.id,a.plan_id,a.source, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.start_poleno, a.end_poleno,pl.name as lineName, a.panoramis_pixel, a.part_pixel, a.sort,a.data_type, a.check_date, a.line_id, a.direction, a.start_station, a.end_station, a.start_station_name, a.end_station_name, a.analyst, a.analy_date, a.upload_person, a.upload_date, a.data_size, a.package_name, a.package_path, a.analy_status, a.defect_data_status, a.rawdata_status, a.system_id, a.section_id
6c_c2_info a left join p_line pl on a.line_id = pl.id
mapper.insert: insert into 6c_c2_info ( id,plan_id,source, start_time, end_time, start_poleno, end_poleno, panoramis_pixel, part_pixel,create_ip, create_by, create_date,data_type, check_date, line_id, direction, start_station, end_station, analyst, analy_date, upload_person, upload_date, data_size, package_name, package_path, analy_status, defect_data_status, rawdata_status, system_id, section_id, start_station_name, end_station_name ,sort ) values( #{id}, #{planId},#{source}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{startPoleno}, #{endPoleno}, #{panoramisPixel}, #{partPixel}, #{createIp}, #{createBy}, #{createDate},#{dataType}, #{checkDate}, #{lineId}, #{direction}, #{startStation}, #{endStation}, #{analyst}, #{analyDate}, #{uploadPerson}, #{uploadDate}, #{dataSize}, #{packageName}, #{packagePath}, #{analyStatus}, #{defectDataStatus}, #{rawdataStatus}, #{systemId}, #{sectionId}, #{startStationName}, #{endStationName} ,#{sort} )
mapper.update:
update 6c_c2_info
source = #{source},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
start_poleno = #{startPoleno},
end_poleno = #{endPoleno},
panoramis_pixel = #{panoramisPixel},
part_pixel = #{partPixel},
data_type = #{dataType},
update_ip = #{updateIp},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
check_date = #{checkDate},
line_id = #{lineId},
direction = #{direction},
start_station = #{startStation},
end_station = #{endStation},
analyst = #{analyst},
analy_date = #{analyDate},
upload_person = #{uploadPerson},
upload_date = #{uploadDate},
data_size = #{dataSize},
package_name = #{packageName},
package_path = #{packagePath},
analy_status = #{analyStatus},
defect_data_status = #{defectDataStatus},
rawdata_status = #{rawdataStatus},
system_id = #{systemId},
section_id = #{sectionId},
start_station_name = #{startStationName},
end_station_name = #{endStationName},
where id = #{id}

update 6c_c2_info set del_flag = 1, delete_ip = #{deleteIp}, delete_by = #{deleteBy}, delete_date = #{deleteDate} where id in
#{item}

update 6c_c2_info set del_flag = 1, delete_date = NOW() where id in
#{item}
